action().description: Generates a URL for the given controller action. You do not need to pass the full namespace of the controller. Instead, pass the controller class name relative to the `App\Http\Controllers` namespace.

asset().description: Generates a URL for an asset using the current scheme of the request (HTTP or HTTPS).

route().description: Generates a URL for the given named route.

secure_asset().description: Generates a URL for an asset using HTTPS.

secure_url().description: Generates a fully qualified HTTPS URL to the given path.

url().description: Generates a fully qualified URL to the given path:.
